node.title: The Smile - A Light for Attracting Attention
node.description: not the smile as in 'ahh', more the smile as in the guy who lies to you every day. the debut from The Smile (Thom Yorke, Jonny Greenwood, and drummer Tom Skinner) was finally released. earlier this year they already released six of the tracks as singles and
node.release: A Light for Attracting Attention was releases on XL Recordings on May 13, 2022.
